instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 b no green light
threads.message:
this macbook not green light, not turn on fan
ppbus_g3h=12.6
smc reset_l=3.45
CHGR_ACIN=3.9v
SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC = 3.48
 PP3V42_G3H =3.48v
 PPCHGR_DCIN =16.22

threads.title: 820-3115 b no green light
threads.message:
Did you try known good DCIN board?
Post U6900 voltages.

threads.title: 820-3115 b no green light
threads.message: corrosion on u6900, which is better process, clean or change immediately u6900?

threads.title: 820-3115 b no green light
threads.message:
Remove it and clean all pads and traces.
Resolder it, if the pins are not damaged.
Check continuity from U6900 to the central pin of DCIN board.
